name: Candy Show - Sweet Easter
description:
Looking for an addictively sweet match 3 game? Candy Show! It's the MOST exciting puzzle adventure on mobile today! Match three or more candy of the same color and earn unique boosts with special matching combinations.

Features:
◆ Hundreds of sweet levels!
◆ Brand new power-ups and ways to play!
◆ Check back often for events, free rewards and new levels!
◆ Free and filled with adventure!
◆ Huge rewards & bonuses!

Embark on this sweet match 3 adventure today!

LIKE US: https://www.facebook.com/CandyShowSweetEaster
publishers: Beijing New Vision Real Estate Development Co
